reviews.text: Фото та відеозйомка коштує 200 UAH. Касса на вході
Mağralar manastırına ücretli 3 giriş kapısından biri, üstü kilise olarak kullanılıyor. İçeride gezilecek müze çan kulesi ve diğer yapılar için ek ücretler ödemeniz gerekiyor.

Церковь имеет и еще одно назначение - вход на территорию Лавры .
Недалеко растет старый куст древовидного пиона .
Аромат при цветении - сногсшибательный .

Great consistent quality and service. I've never gotten a wrong order here nor have they ever forgotten anything. 
Their chili is great. I love getting chili cheese fries with pastrami on top. Their steak sandwiches are good, meat is tender, and come with a pickle (excellent pickle!). The burgers are great and larger than average. 
Their fries are always great.  Not too crispy and fluffy on the inside. A small fry order is about 1/3 of their paper bags full, it's a pretty generous amount. Enough for 2-4 people, depending on how hungry you are.

I can't remember a time when The Hat wasn't a local favorite. 

The food is excellent. All of it. Personally, the best is their chili-cheese fries.

I'm not exaggerating when I say I gained at LEAST 15 lbs in my mid 20's eating WAAAAAY too much chili-cheese fries with pastrami. 

The Hat's Pastrami are the standard for all other Pastrami places. 

Parking's just okay. Traffic in the area is terrible. But the food is worth it. It's been around for almost 70 years for a reason.

Pastrami burger, definitely has pastrami on it and some of the best tasting I've ever had the pleasure of eating. 

Outdoor seating is perfect for southern California weather. Enjoyed it on a Saturday in late January on our way to Disneyland.

Loved it! First time eating at "The Hat" had me there famous pastrami sandwich I will tell you what, I am most definitely coming back there not famous for nothing can't believe I have never been here before. I had there Onion Rings and the fries and it was also 💯👌🤙👍👊
This is where you will have the best pastrami sandwich you ever had, make sure to order the pastrami dip. Awesome!!!!!! is just what comes to mind.

Lovely service. Had the hot bar Sunday am & the frittata was so delicious! Coffee was so delicious.  Used a card & couldn't leave a tip but I was really happy with the service & self serve amenities.  Definitely will be back.
Their bowl of soup is excellent and reasonably priced. Comes with a slice of bread. Best deal in town.
Very kind staff and great coffee and food. Nice atmosphere too.

I enjoy coming here on a Sunday after my yoga class for a matcha latte and a lemon cranberry muffin. I highly recommend both food items. I removed a star because there is only one person working there and while he's nice, he isn't fast and efficient with taking and producing orders. When the line gets long, expect an even longer wait.
Was just there today, (warm,  not hot) mocha expresso was good. I like.  I noticed people from varying age groups.  I am currently not a member of the Co op.  Hope to join
